title: Retribution
description: This is a free novella revisiting the characters from the Knights of the Board Room series, specifically Hostile Takeover, Book 5. It is posted on Joey W. Hill's website under http://storywitch.com/series-cantrips. Two volumes containing ALL the novella and short story character revisits written through 2016 are available for sale in ebook and print, but you can scroll below Cantrips 1 & 2 to find the individual stories still available as FREE downloads in the most common ebook formats.This story is a prequel about Ben of Hostile Takeover (Book V) and Celeste of Soul Rest (Book VII).
author: Joey W. Hill
